name: Everything Is Awesome!
description:
Play Everything Is Awesome. Everything is cool when you play this game.

Everything Is Awesome is a super fun, challenging game. Watch stars fallout of the sky. Tap on them to collect points. But avoid hitting the non awesomeness.

Ensure to tap as fast as you can, to ensure not to miss any of them. Click on special item such as the x2 – to earn double the points, the snowflake to freeze and the no bombs icon to remove the bombs. The game is extremely addictive and will have fun playing for hours on end.

This game is loads of fun, So what are you waiting for. Download and play Everything Is Awesome!!!

Customer Reviews:

***** " Everything about this game is AWESOME!!Truly addictive and awesome game! Can't stop playing it!! " By: DanSinclair
